job_details.job description: IT Recruitment Support Trainee. Provide administrative support to the talent acquisition team. Learn to source candidates,  schedule interviews,  and manage applicant data.
job_details.required qualification: BBA (HR) or B.A. (Psychology/English) graduate (non-premier). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Internal). 12-month role supporting internal employees. Learn to troubleshoot hardware/software issues,  set up new user accounts,  and manage IT assets.
job_details.required qualification: Diploma in Computer Science/IT or B.Sc (IT). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: E-commerce Warehouse Trainee. 12-month role in a fulfillment center (JioMart). Learn inbound/outbound logistics,  order picking/packing,  and inventory software.
job_details.required qualification: Class 12 Pass or B.A. (any discipline). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: Customer Support Trainee (Voice). 12-month role handling customer queries (voice) for a telecom client. Troubleshoot service issues.
job_details.required qualification: B.A. or B.Sc (any discipline,  non-premier). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Voice). 12-month role providing technical support to customers via phone. Troubleshoot hardware/software issues.
job_details.required qualification: B.Sc (IT) or BCA (non-premier institute). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: Customer Support Trainee (Voice). 12-month role handling customer queries (voice) for a telecom client. Troubleshoot service issues.
job_details.required qualification: B.A. or B.Sc (any discipline,  non-premier). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: Customer Support Trainee (Voice). 12-month role handling customer queries (voice) for a telecom client. Troubleshoot service issues.
job_details.required qualification: B.A. or B.Sc (any discipline,  non-premier). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: HR Trainee (Admin). 12-month office role at a factory. Support HR functions like time-keeping,  employee records,  and training coordination.
job_details.required qualification: BBA (HR) graduate (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: HR Trainee (Site Admin). 12-month role at a large project site. Assist with worker time-keeping,  payroll data collection,  and managing site administration.
job_details.required qualification: BBA (HR) or B.A. (any discipline) graduate (non-premier). Must meet PMIS age and income criteria.

job_details.job description: Factory Operations Trainee. 12-month hands-on role at a food/beverage plant. Learn production line operations,  packaging,  and factory safety protocols.
job_details.required qualification: ITI (Fitter/Electrician) or Class 12 Pass (Science). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.
